title: 15 Coats and Jackets From Amazon With High Ratings and Low Prices
description: With winter right around the corner, we now have yet another task to add to our shopping agenda these days - and it involves finding a coat that's stylish, warm, and (ideally!) durable enough to still be something we can wear well into next year, too. Regardless of where you live or how brutal the winter weather can get, finding a coat to sport during the year's coldest months can be daunting - and often, pretty costly, too. Fortunately, there's Amazon. And as with most of our shopping antics, we always know that we can turn to the retailer to find stylish yet affordable fashion pieces, from rain boots to cozy and affordable sweaters and cold-weather workout clothes for the new season. And this year, winter coats and jackets are no exception! Cold gusts of wind and brisk temperatures are at our doorsteps - and naturally, we need to be prepared. If you aren't fully stocked up on cute coats and jackets for the upcoming season, now is the time to get shopping. Already, Amazon has built a pretty impressive selection of outerwear for winter and (bonus!) all at incredibly fair prices, too. We rounded up our favorite options for you to shop through, all in a variety of colors and styles. With such a wide range of price points, you might even be able to buy a few of these choices for your winter wardrobe. Ahead, browse our picks for the best Amazon coats and jackets to shop this season. Related: 11 Designer Jewelry Finds on Amazon That Feel Like Hidden Gems
author: Kyley Warren
excerpt: PS rounded up the best coats and jackets on Amazon that are stylish, warm, and fairly priced.
text: Getty Images | Jeremy MoellerWhile each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.With winter right around the corner, we now have yet another task to add to our shopping agenda these days — and it involves finding a coat that's stylish, warm, and (ideally!) durable enough to still be something we can wear well into next year, too. Regardless of where you live or how brutal the winter weather can get, finding a coat to sport during the year's coldest months can be daunting — and often, pretty costly, too. Fortunately, there's Amazon. And as with most of our shopping antics, we always know that we can turn to the retailer to find stylish yet affordable fashion pieces, from rain boots to cozy and affordable sweaters and cold-weather workout clothes for the new season. And this year, winter coats and jackets are no exception! Cold gusts of wind and brisk temperatures are at our doorsteps — and naturally, we need to be prepared. If you aren't fully stocked up on cute coats and jackets for the upcoming season, now is the time to get shopping. Already, Amazon has built a pretty impressive selection of outerwear for winter and (bonus!) all at incredibly fair prices, too. We rounded up our favorite options for you to shop through, all in a variety of colors and styles. With such a wide range of price points, you might even be able to buy a few of these choices for your winter wardrobe. Ahead, browse our picks for the best Amazon coats and jackets to shop this season. amazon.comBest ShacketHimosyber Button-Up Shacket Coat ($40, originally $53) Few prints signal cold weather season quite like a plaid style. We're loving the modern appeal of this which boasts the warming qualities of a wool-blend coat in a more lightweight style. Bonus: It's also available in other colorways.amazon.comBest Lightweight Puffer JacketAmazon Essentials Water-Resistant Puffer Jacket ($44) Keep it pretty in pink in this charming puffer. Crafted from a weather-proof, polyester material, this puffer is the jacket you're sure to reach for all season long — rain or shine. Don't take our word for it — just read through the 15,000+ near-perfect reviews of the style on Amazon. It's also slim and short enough to fit into a carry-on suitcase or even a personal item bag while traveling.amazon.comBest Motorcycle JacketLY VAREY LIN Faux Leather Motorcycle Jacket ($46) In the market for a jacket that will provide your wardrobe with just the right pop of color? A classic style like this is one of the most timeless pieces to invest in. We'd layer this jacket with a black and white striped blouse, plus faux-leather leggings to match.amazon.comBest Faux Shearling JacketPretty Garden Faux Shearling Oversized Jacket ($49) When the mood strikes for something warm and fuzzy, this shearling jacket should be top of your list. The collar and pockets lend structure to an otherwise roomy coat. It's Amazon's bestseller in women's fur and faux fur category, so it's a popular option with good reviews to back it.amazon.comBest Bomber JacketZeagoo Bomber Jacket ($46) For a more fitted quilted jacket, this bomber style features cuffed sleeves and a tapered hemline. It comes in several colors (though it's so popular that many are sold out), and you can choose between a quilted or classic style.amazon.comBest Denim JacketGap Women's Icon Denim Jacket ($49, originally $53) Few brands nail a classic denim jacket quite like Gap, and yes, you can get your hands on this timeless staple on Amazon Prime with two-day shipping. It comes in a versatile medium wash and is the perfect layering piece to take you from fall to winter.amazon.comBest Oversize Leather JacketAutomet Womens Oversized Leather Jacket ($50) Love the oversize faux leather jacket look à la Hailey Bieber? Consider your perfect match found. It's made of luxe faux leather and comes in several colors, but we're loving this rich, chocolatey brown that's so on-trend.amazon.comBest Sweater CoatAnrabess Open Front Sweater Jacket ($50, originally $70) When you want something soft and warm that you can comfortably wear indoors, a sweater coat is perfect. This one has pockets and lapels to drive home the coat aesthetic, which makes it feel polished. Grab it in this pretty camel color or 27 other options.amazon.comBest Quilted JacketSaukole Quilted Jacket ($58, originally $73) Oversized quilted jackets are everywhere, and there's a lot to love about this comfy trend. Padded with cotton tencel, this jacket will keep you toasty while the suede outer material adds a beautiful texture.amazon.comBest PeacoatHooever Single-Breasted Peacoat ($60) When you need warm and elevated outerwear, this peacoat will add plenty of polish. The knee-length hem will keep more of your body warm and it comes in nine colors. It also happens to be Amazon's bestselling women's peacoat.amazon.comBest Hooded Puffer CoatWenVen Winter Thicken Puffer Coat ($74, originally $87) Crafted with a polyester shell and synthetic insulation, this is the winter jacket to have in your closet when those brisk, winter temperatures make their first appearance of the season. The jacket also has convenient and deep pockets that provide the most stylish, practical touches!amazon.comBest Belted JacketLadiyo Open Front Belted Jacket ($80, originally $140) For a look that screams "chic," this long jacket is a no-brainer. Wear it open for an effortless vibe, or belt it for a more cinched silhouette. Shoppers call it a compliment magnet and many praise its versatility.PS Photography | India YaffeBest Down JacketOrolay Women's Thickened Down Jacket ($140, originally $150) This Amazon jacket is internet-famous for a reason: After going viral in 2018, it became the jacket everyone owns. If you're okay with twinning with lots of people, thousands of shoppers rave about its warmth, style, and endless pockets. It comes in several colors and patterns, too, including navy (pictured on our editor here), beige, and camo, among others. Learn more via our Orolay Women's Thickened Down Jacket review.Editor Quote: "This coat is warm. Like, actually warm. I classify my coats as either a 40-degree coat or a 20-degree coat, and this is definitely a 20-degree coat. I don't know how, but it's made of real down. I've spilled matcha on it, and it slides right off. As if that wasn't enough, the coat has an oversize parka style that looks much more expensive than it is; someone asked me if it was designer, and I was proud to say that I got it on Amazon." — India Yaffe, former associate editor, ShoppingPS Photography | Kyley WarrenBest Long Down JacketOrolay Women's Thickened Long Down Jacket ($150) We also had to include the Orolay Women's Thickened Down Jacket's longer counterpart, which one of our editors tested on a trip to Iceland. Spoiler alert: She loved it and said that after years of shopping she's "never found a warmer coat." Read more in her comprehensive Orolay Women's Thickened Long Down Jacket review.Editor Quote: "This Orolay jacket ticks all of my boxes and then some; it's crafted from a polyester material that's windproof and waterproof, with an extra-large, adjustable hood that helps to keep my face protected in harsher temperatures." — Kyley Warren, assistant editor, Shopping- — Additional reporting by Marisa PetrarcaKyley Warren (she/her) is an award-winning writer, editor, and affiliate strategist with more than four years of experience in the publishing space. She currently works as an assistant editor on PS Shopping and is an expert on all things related to shopping and fashion. She previously worked with Entertainment Tonight as a style commerce writer, and her byline has appeared in publications globally.Marisa Petrarca (she/her) is a contributing editor for PS Shopping and has over seven years of experience writing and editing beauty, fashion, and lifestyle content. She was previously the senior beauty editor at Grazia USA and the style and beauty editor at Us Weekly. Now freelancing, her work has been featured in Cosmopolitan, Allure, Marie Claire, and more. When she's not working on a story, you can probably find her testing the latest makeup, skin-care, or hair launches. Marisa lives in Saint Paul, MN, with her husband and their corgi, Cooper.
html:
While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.

With winter right around the corner, we now have yet another task to add to our shopping agenda these days — and it involves finding a coat that's stylish, warm, and (ideally!) durable enough to still be something we can wear well into next year, too. Regardless of where you live or how brutal the winter weather can get, finding a coat to sport during the year's coldest months can be daunting — and often, pretty costly, too. Fortunately, there's Amazon. And as with most of our shopping antics, we always know that we can turn to the retailer to find stylish yet affordable fashion pieces, from rain boots to cozy and affordable sweaters and cold-weather workout clothes for the new season. And this year, winter coats and jackets are no exception!

Cold gusts of wind and brisk temperatures are at our doorsteps — and naturally, we need to be prepared. If you aren't fully stocked up on cute coats and jackets for the upcoming season, now is the time to get shopping. Already, Amazon has built a pretty impressive selection of outerwear for winter and (bonus!) all at incredibly fair prices, too. We rounded up our favorite options for you to shop through, all in a variety of colors and styles.

With such a wide range of price points, you might even be able to buy a few of these choices for your winter wardrobe. Ahead, browse our picks for the best Amazon coats and jackets to shop this season.

Best Shacket

Himosyber Button-Up Shacket Coat ($40, originally $53)

Few prints signal cold weather season quite like a plaid style. We're loving the modern appeal of this which boasts the warming qualities of a wool-blend coat in a more lightweight style. Bonus: It's also available in other colorways.

Best Lightweight Puffer Jacket

Amazon Essentials Water-Resistant Puffer Jacket ($44)
Keep it pretty in pink in this charming puffer. Crafted from a weather-proof, polyester material, this puffer is the jacket you're sure to reach for all season long — rain or shine. Don't take our word for it — just read through the 15,000+ near-perfect reviews of the style on Amazon. It's also slim and short enough to fit into a carry-on suitcase or even a personal item bag while traveling.

Best Motorcycle Jacket

LY VAREY LIN Faux Leather Motorcycle Jacket ($46)

In the market for a jacket that will provide your wardrobe with just the right pop of color? A classic style like this is one of the most timeless pieces to invest in. We'd layer this jacket with a black and white striped blouse, plus faux-leather leggings to match.

Best Faux Shearling Jacket

Pretty Garden Faux Shearling Oversized Jacket ($49)

When the mood strikes for something warm and fuzzy, this shearling jacket should be top of your list. The collar and pockets lend structure to an otherwise roomy coat. It's Amazon's bestseller in women's fur and faux fur category, so it's a popular option with good reviews to back it.

Best Bomber Jacket

Zeagoo Bomber Jacket ($46)

For a more fitted quilted jacket, this bomber style features cuffed sleeves and a tapered hemline. It comes in several colors (though it's so popular that many are sold out), and you can choose between a quilted or classic style.

Best Denim Jacket

Gap Women's Icon Denim Jacket ($49, originally $53)

Few brands nail a classic denim jacket quite like Gap, and yes, you can get your hands on this timeless staple on Amazon Prime with two-day shipping. It comes in a versatile medium wash and is the perfect layering piece to take you from fall to winter.

Best Oversize Leather Jacket

Automet Womens Oversized Leather Jacket ($50)

Love the oversize faux leather jacket look à la Hailey Bieber? Consider your perfect match found. It's made of luxe faux leather and comes in several colors, but we're loving this rich, chocolatey brown that's so on-trend.

Best Sweater Coat

Anrabess Open Front Sweater Jacket ($50, originally $70)

When you want something soft and warm that you can comfortably wear indoors, a sweater coat is perfect. This one has pockets and lapels to drive home the coat aesthetic, which makes it feel polished. Grab it in this pretty camel color or 27 other options.

Best Quilted Jacket

Saukole Quilted Jacket ($58, originally $73)

Oversized quilted jackets are everywhere, and there's a lot to love about this comfy trend. Padded with cotton tencel, this jacket will keep you toasty while the suede outer material adds a beautiful texture.

Best Peacoat

Hooever Single-Breasted Peacoat ($60)

When you need warm and elevated outerwear, this peacoat will add plenty of polish. The knee-length hem will keep more of your body warm and it comes in nine colors. It also happens to be Amazon's bestselling women's peacoat.

Best Hooded Puffer Coat

WenVen Winter Thicken Puffer Coat ($74, originally $87)

Crafted with a polyester shell and synthetic insulation, this is the winter jacket to have in your closet when those brisk, winter temperatures make their first appearance of the season. The jacket also has convenient and deep pockets that provide the most stylish, practical touches!

Best Belted Jacket

Ladiyo Open Front Belted Jacket ($80, originally $140)

For a look that screams "chic," this long jacket is a no-brainer. Wear it open for an effortless vibe, or belt it for a more cinched silhouette. Shoppers call it a compliment magnet and many praise its versatility.

Best Down Jacket

Orolay Women's Thickened Down Jacket ($140, originally $150)

This Amazon jacket is internet-famous for a reason: After going viral in 2018, it became the jacket everyone owns. If you're okay with twinning with lots of people, thousands of shoppers rave about its warmth, style, and endless pockets. It comes in several colors and patterns, too, including navy (pictured on our editor here), beige, and camo, among others. Learn more via our Orolay Women's Thickened Down Jacket review.

Editor Quote: "This coat is warm. Like, actually warm. I classify my coats as either a 40-degree coat or a 20-degree coat, and this is definitely a 20-degree coat. I don't know how, but it's made of real down. I've spilled matcha on it, and it slides right off. As if that wasn't enough, the coat has an oversize parka style that looks much more expensive than it is; someone asked me if it was designer, and I was proud to say that I got it on Amazon." — India Yaffe, former associate editor, Shopping

Best Long Down Jacket

Orolay Women's Thickened Long Down Jacket ($150)

We also had to include the Orolay Women's Thickened Down Jacket's longer counterpart, which one of our editors tested on a trip to Iceland. Spoiler alert: She loved it and said that after years of shopping she's "never found a warmer coat." Read more in her comprehensive Orolay Women's Thickened Long Down Jacket review.

Editor Quote: "This Orolay jacket ticks all of my boxes and then some; it's crafted from a polyester material that's windproof and waterproof, with an extra-large, adjustable hood that helps to keep my face protected in harsher temperatures." — Kyley Warren, assistant editor, Shopping

— Additional reporting by Marisa Petrarca

Kyley Warren (she/her) is an award-winning writer, editor, and affiliate strategist with more than four years of experience in the publishing space. She currently works as an assistant editor on PS Shopping and is an expert on all things related to shopping and fashion. She previously worked with Entertainment Tonight as a style commerce writer, and her byline has appeared in publications globally.

Marisa Petrarca (she/her) is a contributing editor for PS Shopping and has over seven years of experience writing and editing beauty, fashion, and lifestyle content. She was previously the senior beauty editor at Grazia USA and the style and beauty editor at Us Weekly. Now freelancing, her work has been featured in Cosmopolitan, Allure, Marie Claire, and more. When she's not working on a story, you can probably find her testing the latest makeup, skin-care, or hair launches. Marisa lives in Saint Paul, MN, with her husband and their corgi, Cooper.
